original_story: "In a dystopian future, brave-hearted Iris stumbles upon a cryptic message in a decrepit library. It reveals a hidden oasis, a haven in the desolate world. Iris ventures through perilous wastelands, fights mutant creatures, and uncovers the oasis, restoring hope for humanity."

relation_mapping.\"In a dystopian future, brave: hearted Iris stumbles upon a cryptic message in a decrepit library. It reveals a hidden oasis, a haven in the desolate world. Iris ventures through perilous wastelands, fights mutant creatures, and uncovers the oasis, restoring hope for humanity."
